Package local.intranet.tombola.api.controller

Class InfoController

java.lang.Object
local.intranet.tombola.api.controller.InfoController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${spring.data.rest.basePath:/api}/v1") public class InfoController extends Object
InfoController for TombolaApplication It's for charge of working with buffers and for REST methods

info from services in local.intranet.tombola.api.service

  • Method Details

    • getIndexInfo

      @GetMapping(value="/info", produces="application/json") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_userRole\')") public IndexInfo getIndexInfo()
      Root gives other REST links

      Like this 

       {
   "name": "IndexService",
   "components": [
     {
       "link": "/api/v1/info/bean",
       "name": "BeanService",
       "role": "userRole"
     },
     {
       "link": "/api/v1/info/user",
       "name": "UserService",
       "status": "UP",
       "role": "userRole"
     },
     {
       "link": "/api/v1/info/role",
       "name": "RoleService",
       "status": "UP",
       "role": "userRole"
     }
   ]
 }

      Accessible to the RoleType.USER_ROLE.

      Used IndexService.getIndexInfo().

      Returns:
      IndexInfo
      See Also:
      • swagger-ui/#/info-controller/getIndexInfo
